PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1998-03121998-03-100,  HERITAGE,  ,  , 
PrecisAppointment of VALENTINE H. CONWAY, of St. John's, Newfoundland, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Broadcasting Corporation to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, in the place of the Honourable Brian Peckford, whose term has expired.
Attachments
